wikipedia_page.main:
Daniel Paul Wright (born 10 September 1984) is an English footballer who plays as a forward for Torquay United. He operates in the target man role, using his height to his advantage.He has played ten seasons in the National League in service of eight clubs, totalling over 100 goals across more than 300 games. He added 74 games and 12 goals in EFL League Two for Cheltenham Town, already in his 30s.
In his career he won the Conference South with Histon in 2007, the FA Trophy with Wrexham in 2013 and the National League for Cheltenham in 2016.

response: Daniel Wright or Dan Wright may refer to:
* Daniel Wright Junior High School, Lake County, Illinois, U.S.
